description: A React functional component named 'Icon' that renders inline SVG icons based on the 'name' prop. It includes several predefined icons such as 'github', 'linkedin', 'mail', 'logo', and additional dev icons like 'react', 'js', 'python', and 'shield'.

methods.name: Icon({ name, size = 20 })
methods.description: React functional component returning SVG icons based on 'name' prop, with optional size parameter.
